replies.body:
Since I can't see who my targets/nemeses are from my stats page, I'll just post who I pick on/who picks on me the most in-game.
Targets:
JKawesome- Because #TargetJK
FrostedCupcakez- Because she kills me too much and also #TargetFrosted
Warbry- KFP all the way
Ducksfanwaterloo- Me knows how to open roast dux shop! Yey!
glitchy1- Bully
Nemeses:
JKawesome- Because #TargetMilk
FrostedCupcakez- My KDR against her is probably something like 1/5 lol
Warbry- I target him too much

replies.body:
I can't printscreen at work so ...

Targets
Captain_McPie 35 Kills
xxxheraxxx - 24 Kills

Nemeses
xxxheraxxx - 14 Deaths
Captain_McPie 11 Deaths

I'm sure you clearly see the difference between us, especially those who talk about how bad I am. #CallOut #DaGoldBrickGotNotin'OnMe ;)
